Message:
This country’s controlled
entirely by that witch’s power.
if I had that witch’s power,

maybe I could escape from
this miserable life of mine.

People always say there’s
no time like the present,

so I went undercover as a pilgrim
and headed for the Holy See,

where that witch was
apparently being held.

On the way, a group of poor
pilgrims befriended me.

I thought myself lucky at first,
but they turned out to be much
more of a nuisance than anything.
